Sterling_Heights.Lakeside Mall: Lakeside Mall is a Taubman-built super-regional full-line shopping mall located in the northeastern Metro Detroit suburb of Sterling Heights, Michigan. The mall is located on M-59 (Hall Road) between Hayes and Schoenherr Roads. Lakeside Mall features five anchor stores: JCPenney, Lord & Taylor, two Macy's, and Sears, as well as the first H&M in Michigan.
